description: Try our easy to follow Pork Mignons with Garlic Butter, Paprika Carrots & Crispy Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Mignons with Garlic Butter, Paprika Carrots & Crispy Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs butter, melted (save 1 tbs to cook pork mignon)
2 bunch dutch carrots, washed and peeled

recipeInstructions.text: Wrap each mignon with a slice of prosciutto and secure with a bamboo skewer. Set aside. Place carrots in an ovenproof dish.
Combine butter and paprika in a bowl. Pour over carrots. Toss to combine.
Bake for 30 minutes or until tender.
Place potatoes in a saucepan of boiling water. Cook for 8-10 minutes or until soft.
Place on a baking tray and press each potato with a potato masher. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and parmesan. Bake in a hot oven for 10-15 minutes or until crispy.
Heat extra butter and oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook pork for 4-6 minutes on each side.
